sentences.sentence: You'll get another bollocking at school. They'll want to know why you were nicking things.
sentences.translation: 学校也会质问你，他们想知道你怎么会被抓住。

sentences.sentence: Yet again it took going a goal down and a half-time bollocking from Mourinho before the players showed their best form.
sentences.translation: 不过这却再一次令半场落后一球然后受到穆里尼奥臭骂一顿的球员们显示了他们最好的状态。
